original_text: In that thou buildest thine eminent place in the head of every way, and makest thine high place in every street; and hast not been as an harlot, in that thou scornest hire;
korean_text: 네가 누각을 모든 길 어귀에 건축하며 높은 대를 모든 거리에 쌓고도 값을 싫어하니 창기 같지도 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: In that thou buildest thine eminent place
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너의 높은 곳을 건축하기 때문에

sentences.original_text: in the head of every way
and hast not been as an harlot
